column5: Ok is it just me or is there no extra long handles available to fit a frabile net without buying a whole new net???? I just want a long handle for dipsey rigs!   Darren
Not knowing the inner or outer dimensions of you current net handle but a good place to start looking might be your local hardware/paint store for heavy duty twist/extending handles.
The extended pole for cleaning pools has work for me. The inner piece. Pool gone happy nets.
Thanks guys!!  Thats why I ask the questions on here!
